divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my best friend were ready with our work in an art achitecture construction, so we decided to go to the central square, as usuall when e have nothing else to do, it was almost night but still a bit clear, it was cloudy, and i dont know why looked to the sky and sow two lights blue and red, like the airplanes ones, and i asked my friend what was taht and she says is an airplane but then i realized tht they werent moving but suddenly they moved but way too slow for being an airplane, so i stood quite, and told my friend that i wanted to be sure that that was an airplane, and started telling her that it was moving too slow and not like an airplane does, but she didnt believe me until it changed it direction and came closer to us the closer it was the more it whowed it shape it was transparent but one could see perfectly the shape,it was exactly above us with its triangular shape really close,, my friend couldnt believe it, as it was going away i run and started jumping like making signals to them i wanted to be seen, i dont know if other people sow the place was wit a lot of people we were in the middle of the street in the central part of the city. i called one friend to wathc the sky but he was too far, we sow it til it dissapear, my freind was kinda in shock cuz she always said she didnt beleive in it, I do so i tried to explain a bit, a sensation of wellness came to me I was extremely happy, i sow some UFO���s before but never so close and with so many persons, i regreted myself not havin a camera cuz it was really near.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Santa Cruz
There were no other sightings in Santa Cruz on or around June 16th 2009
Summary: An UFO came direct over us very low and showed its shape clearly.
